game.name: Odyssey Times - A Quest for Adventure
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Embark on a story-driven adventure where dynamic combat and leveling meet the charm of a SNES-era JRPG.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on a story-driven adventure where dynamic combat and leveling meet the charm of a SNES-era JRPG.
